Package infinity.ui

Class Ui

java.lang.Object
infinity.ui.Ui
public class Ui extends Object
This class handles the user interface of the bot.

    • echo

      public void echo(String input) throws InfinityException
      Tries to echoe the input back to the user but fails as input is not recognised.
      Parameters:
      input - The input to attempt to echo back.
      Throws:
      InfinityException - Always thrown as the input is not recognised.
